be_in_touch.main_header: Golos.io is hard working on the release the app for iOS devices.
be_in_touch.main_description_1: The blogging platform of the future Golos.io has already running on web and Android platforms.
be_in_touch.main_description_2: Now the turn has come to please iOs users.
be_in_touch.almost_done: The application Golos.io for iOS will appear very soon
be_in_touch.want_test: I want to test. Add me to the list of testers alpha version of the application.
be_in_touch.want_message: Notify me when the app is released.

steps.third_step_desc: Find out first about the release of the application

screenshots.screen_1: Blog platform of the future. Write, take pictures, comment.
screenshots.screen_2: Learn new things. Subscribe to interesting authors.
screenshots.screen_3: Be in the top. On Golos.io valued opinions, stories, creative content.

about_golos.main_description: Talk about what's important to you. Discover new and interesting.
about_golos.interests: You can write about everything. Tell about rocket science or post a photo of your favorite cat.
about_golos.self_expressive: Share what is important to you. Publish articles, stories, poems, photos, videos, audio recordings, whatever.
about_golos.be_yourself: Create a blog the way you like it. Vote for quality content. Subscribe to the topics you are concerned about and discover completely new ones.
about_golos.find_friends: Communicate with millions of people in millions of communities. Explore millions of different #hashtags.
about_golos.how_it_works: Golos.io is a blogging platform where users can post and vote and discuss articles they like. By voting for your give your “voice” for it.

android.download: You could download the Android application for right now

android_reviews.title: Reviews
android_reviews.first_review: Interesting application) has not yet fully understood it, but this is really something new what has not yet been on the Internet))
android_reviews.second_review: Just found out about this project today. Loved it right away. At last, something new appeared, probably like a facebook, but more advanced. Great!
android_reviews.third_review: Great motivation for creativity and tons of interesting information)
android_reviews.fourth_review: This is a serious platform that has a future. Thanks to the developers for the app.
android_reviews.fifth_review: So far, the best that came across
